text: Tonic Trouble is a 1999 video game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and released for the Nintendo 64, Game Boy Color and Windows. ==Gameplay== The player plays as a purple alien named Ed who has to stop Gr√∂gh from using a magical tonic.
